entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
